Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2008...
Had first career hit on 8/16/2012, off Mitch Talbot (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/20/2012, off Ricky Nolasco (MIL)...
Won World Championship with San Francisco in 2012...
Traded from San Francisco to Minnesota on 2/4/2014 (Going to SF: LF D. Muñoz, C M. Perez. Going to MIN: 2B J. Giavotella)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cleveland on 4/26/2014...
Traded from Minnesota to Washington on 6/29/2014 (Going to MIN: P Y. Lara, 1B C. Utley, P K. Gregg. Going to WSH: C S. Riggans, 2B J. Giavotella, 3B J. Esposito)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2015...
Traded from Washington to New York (N) on 4/1/2016 (Going to NYN: SS J. Giavotella. Going to WSH: 2B C. Colon, SS J. Ortiz)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/8/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/9/2016, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2016, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 18 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 10/6/2017...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Washington on 6/23/2018...
Injured on 8/24/2018 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 2/4/2020 (Going to CIN: SS A. Simmons, 2B J. Giavotella. Going to NYN: 1B Z. Bonura Jr., SS F. Crosetti Jr.)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/22/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $1,480,000 per year...
